sys_atf_step.description: Set the following values on the form: Define Proposed Change = We'd like the permissions level the Sales Members Group currently has (Contribute) changed to Read, Users are making changes that are causing issues with calculators and templates in the library.Additionally, there are multiple user accounts for employees no longer with the company we'd like removed. I've attached a spreadsheet that lists both the Sales Member and Sales Owner group memberships for reference.Currently, the only members of the Sales Members group that need the ability to make changes of any kind to that library are Patrick Abel, Kevin Boucher, Brad Shannon, John Crouch, Carson Plunkett, Vadim Sushchik, Josiah Spann, Patrick Peebles, Ken Snyder, and Jay Simcox

test.display_value: ATF Generated Test - change_request, Jay Simcox, User's default view (Default view)
